attributes.action: Abolish the TV license and make BBC reception optional.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the advent of digital television, it will soon be possible for the BBC to encode their broadcasts in the same way as commercial television companies. We believe that once this can be done, the television license fee should become optional, with the alternative being to no longer receive BBC television broadcasts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
